app[content][about]: [p][i]Welcome to the station that forgives no mistakes…[/i] [/p][p][/p][p]In a grim steampunk world where technology intertwines with mystique, uncover the mysteries of the long-abandoned but fiercely guarded Isolation 9. [i]ExoCogs[/i] is an intense top-down (third person) shooter for 1-4 players, where you command a team of unique specialists: the Technician, Soldier, Medic, and Commander, each with essential survival skills.[/p][p][/p][p][b]Key Features:[/b][/p][list][*][p][b]Cooperative Gameplay[/b]: Battle alongside friends or solo, using each character’s abilities to overcome traps and enemies.[/p][/*][*][p][b]Character Customization[/b]: Choose from two unique representatives per class, each with individual skills and combat styles.[/p][/*][*][p][b]Steampunk World of Mechanisms[/b]: Navigate levels filled with incredible yet deadly machines, ancient security systems, and unpredictable traps.[/p][/*][*][p][b]Deep Storyline[/b]: Dive into the dark secrets of the station, its peculiar mechanisms, and the mysterious Project Spark.[/p][p][/p][/*][/list][p]Ready to lead your heroes through ancient security systems to survive and uncover the truth? In [i]ExoCogs[/i], every step is a test.[/p]
app[content][short_description]: ExoCogs is a top-down (third person), co-op shooter for 1-4 players set in a grim steampunk world. Play as the Technician, Soldier, Medic, or Commander to uncover the secrets of an abandoned station filled with traps and guarded by automatons. Explore and reveal the mysteries of Project Spark.
